Saleforce | Senior UI Platform Engineer | SF Onsite

https://www.mulesoft.com/

Searching for deeply experienced UI engineerd to work on the UI platform that drives the companies entire product suite, handling navigation, AuthN, routing, isolation, and other deep magic. Position requires rare combination of deep understanding of modern UI tech and framework/platform architecture knowledge. Stack: React, Webpack, Babel, NPM, Jenkins, AWS, Kubernetes, CloudFront.

We work in Salesforce tower, with the best view of San Francisco and the bay area in the world.

Resumes to nbenami@mulesoft.com.
